guardian.title: Merkel to meet Obama to resolve Ukrainian differences
guardian.topComment: US will be helping by staying out of it. It has no understanding of world affairs and shit hits the fan whenever US tries some military adventure. I doubt if one in ten Americans is able to point Ukraine on a map.

guardian.title: Sam Smith and Beck scoop top prizes
guardian.topComment: Who's Sam Smith? Boy George has let himself go.

guardian.title: Harper Lee 'hurt and humiliated' by book controversy
guardian.topComment: People seem to think that just because you are older that you must be senile and have no control over your faculties. I notice the same insinuations this week when our Supreme Court in Canada said people should have the right to die with dignity - al...
